page.title: 14TRANSPORT - MOTORWAY
page.content: The M90 by-passes Kelty immediately to the West. The M90 has scarcely been advantageous to the Kelty Community. In fact, it could be said that it facilitates the commuter to leave Kelty and back home in the evening. The Bus Services have been cut drastically. If there had'nt been the motorway the buses would have kept more of their passengers. Instead of travelling by bus the commuters travel by car and carry colleagues with them. Again, the motorway has had adverse results for trade, ASDA Superstore in Dunfermline, and recently the FINE FARE Store in Cowdenbeath along with the free bus services provided has effected the shopkeepers in Kelty.
